golden_answer: The color and pattern on the larval body of the carpenterworm moth include shades of gray with white speckles distributed across its wings. The pattern resembles a mottled or marbled appearance.<｜end▁of▁sentence｜>
adv_answer: The color and pattern on the larval body of the carpenterworm moth include shades of gray with white speckles or spots distributed across its wings and body. The pattern appears irregular and somewhat mottled, giving it a textured appearance.<｜end▁of▁sentence｜>
